title: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin exits MakerDAO position
description: The co-founder of the Ethereum network sold his remaining stake of 500 MakerDAO tokens, according to Onchain data.

title: Tether market cap slips as stablecoin ecosystem shifts
description: Tether sees first market cap dip in nine months. Meanwhile, the overall stablecoin market shrank for the 17th consecutive month, per CCData.
